name: Marquee Feed Plugin
description: This plugin allows website owners to easily add a marquee to their site that displays the most recent titles from an XML feed. This is an attractive and dynamic way to present updated content to visitors, improving the user experience by providing quick access to the latest posts.
author: htejera

messageInOptions.text: To enable the marquee functionality, make sure to enter the XML feed URL in the plugin settings. You can also customize the experience by adjusting the available configuration parameters according to your needs.

config.name: feedUrl
config.label: XML Feed URL
config.note: Enter the URL to your website's XML feed to display the titles in the marquee.

config.name: showOnMobile
config.label: Show on Mobile
config.note: Check this box to display the marquee on mobile devices.

config.name: borderTop
config.label: Top Border
config.note: Style for the top border of the marquee. Default: 'dashed'.

config.name: borderBottom
config.label: Bottom Border Style
config.note: Style for the bottom border of the marquee. Default: 'dashed'.

config.name: borderColor
config.label: Border Color
config.note: Color of the marquee border. Default: 'white'.

config.name: textSize
config.label: Text Size
config.note: The size of the content text. Default: '14px'.

config.name: textColor
config.label: Text Color
config.note: The color of the content text. Default: 'White'.

config.name: linkHoverColor
config.label: Link Hover Color
config.note: The color of the link when the user hovers over it. Default: 'Blue'.

config.name: backgroundColor
config.label: Background Color
config.note: The color of the marquee's background. Default: 'Black'.

config.name: animationSpeed
config.label: Animation Speed
config.note: Adjust the speed of the marquee animation (in seconds). Default value: 100s.

config.name: info
config.label: Information Message
config.note: This message will be displayed next to the marquee. It can be useful for providing context or additional information.

config.name: marqueeSeparator
config.label: Title Separator
config.note: The text or symbol used to separate the titles in the marquee. Default: '|'.

config.name: targetElementSelector
config.label: Target Element Selector for the Marquee
config.note: Enter the CSS selector of the element where you want to insert the marquee. For example, '#myElementId' for an ID or '.myClass' for a class. Default: 'body'
